description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in templates/mytribiqsite/tribal-GPL-1066/includes/header.inc.php in Tribiq CMS 5.0.10a, when register_globals is enabled, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the template_path parameter.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.
